product.description: The Reveal HD+ LED 60W replacement A19 light bulb provides pure, clean light. The advanced technology enhances colors plus whitens white for exceptional clarity. Replace ordinary bulbs with a Reveal HD+ light bulb to see vivid colors and vibrant whites in high definition. The bulb is dimmable and illuminates your home with clean, beautiful light. Great for frequently used fixtures: the Reveal HD+ is rated to last 13 years and saves 85 dollars on energy costs over the bulb's life versus a 60W Reveal incandescent bulb. Unlike CFL bulbs, Reveal HD+ offers exceptional color, instant full brightness, and is free of mercury. Replace CFL and incandescent light bulbs with the Reveal HD+ general-purpose LED light bulb in indoor table lamps, sconces, and open fixtures, including damp locations. Use Reveal HD+ where clarity matters, especially kitchens, bathrooms, and craft and hobby spaces. Bulb dimensions: 4. 84"H x 2. 95"Dia. A19 bulb with E26 (medium) base. Provides balanced vivid white (2850K) light at 610 lumens. With a color rendering index (CRI) of 90, this LED bulb provides excellent color accuracy. deals.title: Household Essentials Krush Container Red/Black Poly Cotton Utility Tote, Large (2220-1)
deals.description: This is a great product!

product.description: This Household Essentials Krush Container versatile utility tote is spacious, durable, practical and has a variety of applications. It's perfect for beach days, camping trips, picnics, tailgating, kids' sports games, grocery shopping, hauling laundry or just as an organizer tote in your trunk or home. The bag is made of canvas with a water-resistant vinyl lining. The lining is grafted into the fabric, adding durable protection without extra weight or bulk. The water-resistant lining means easy cleanup, on the inside or outside. Prevent moisture from seeping into the bag from wet sand or grass, and keep moisture from condensation or spills inside the bag from leaking out. The lining also helps prevent staining and makes the bag easier to clean. The tote features two long handles attached for easy carrying, and four large exterior pockets with hook-and-loop closures to keep them secure. These pockets are perfect for keeping essential items within easy reach, such as sunscreen or sports drinks, without having to dive into the bag's large main compartment. The bag's long rectangular shape is especially well-suited for any trunk, making it a great bag to keep with you in your car. Use this tote to carry essentials, such as emergency kit items or tools, or just as an organizer for other car essentials. Fill it up with car or dorm essentials before sending a new grad on their way, or fill it with drinks and snacks for a road trip. The durable lining means you can use the bag to house trash from finished drinks and snacks, too, knowing you'll have an easy cleanup later. When the bag is not in use, it folds flat for easy storage. To clean the bag, give it a rinse and use the attached hanging loop to hang it out to dry. Dimensions: 13"H x 22"W x 11"D. When the bag is not in use, it folds flat for easy storage. Equipped with two long handles for easy carrying. Water-resistant lining means easy cleanup both on the inside and outside of the bag. This large treated poly canvas utility tote with a water-resistant vinyl lining has a number of practical uses and features. Bag's long rectangular shape is well-suited for any trunk, making it great to keep with you in your car. Collapsible and water-resistant, with four large exterior pockets with hook-and-loop closures to keep contents secure. Use for picnics, beach days, camping, sporting events, grocery shopping, and more

deals.description: You can't go wrong with this one!

product.description: The Kanguru UltraLock USB 3. 0 External Hard Drive is a high-speed USB 3. 0 that offers a generous amount of data storage. The UltraLock features a convenient physical write protect switch to toggle between reading/write and read-only mode. This great feature when enabled can give you peace of mind to work safely on any computer the UltraLock is connected to. Students, travellers and researchers alike will appreciate the ability to read files on any school, library or hotel workstation without the worry of being possibly infected by a virus that could be lurking on a public computer. The lightweight design of this write-protected external hard drive makes it small and light enough for backpacks, even pockets and is a great, affordable way to store data. The protective rubber skin provides protection from jars and bumps, making it ideal for travel. Comes with a protective rubber skin, USB 3. 0 Y-type cable, and quick start guide. Features a USB 3. 0 port with up to 100MB/s (USB 3. 0) or 30MB/s (USB 2. 0) sequential read and 90MB/s (USB 3. 0) or 25MB/s (USB 2. 0) sequential write speeds. Compact, lightweight, durable construction. 2-year manufacturer limited warranty. Compatible with Windows 8/10/11, macOS 10. 3 or newer, and Linux. 5TB external hard drive for a simple and affordable way to save and protect your data. Physical write protect switch. Bus powered. Meets or exceeds the TAA standards

When used with a conventional filtering face mask, the continuous emission of unipolar air ions has been shown to considerably enhance the filtering efficiency against fine and ultrafine particles. Purification lasts all day, with a rechargeable battery providing over 24 hours of use per charge. Includes a USB charging cable and breakaway neck cord.
